synopsis.text: Open Your Mind is a multi-act musical drama that explores the origins of life on an alien planet. It begins with six deities descending from outer space, each representing an element of the godai philosophy - earth, water, fire, wind, sky, and consciousness. In the first act "Sho-ho", aquatic lifeforms emerge and thrive in the planet's waters. The second act "Hyakkin" depicts creatures taking to the skies and air. Finally, in the third act "Ku-nu", beings emerge onto land, bringing the planet to life. Throughout the drama, beautiful CGI and live-action footage mix to create stunning visuals of this fantastical world. The unique musical score complements the visuals. As the acts unfold, the extraterrestrial deities gradually shape the planet through their elemental powers. Diverse ecosystems form, with animals living in harmony. Ultimately, Open Your Mind artistically presents the genesis of life on the alien planet. The creative format aims to captivate viewers' imaginations and convey an appreciation for the natural world.
